definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: It’s like four feet tall with two swinging doors, solid oak.
sentences.chinese: 那個櫃子大概足有4尺高，帶兩扇合頁門，純橡木的。

sentences.english: The hinges are self-closing the last few centimetres, leaving the door fully closed.
sentences.chinese: 合頁在最後的幾釐米自動關閉，使門完全閉合。
這扇窗戶共有八個合頁。

sentences.english: The carpenter attached the door to the hinge.
sentences.chinese: 那位木匠將門安裝到了合頁上。

sentences.english: He slowly opened the lid that hinged to the box.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地打開了用合頁接合的箱子蓋。

sentences.english: The hind wheel of it was shot down. And its door was off the hinges.
sentences.chinese: 它的後輪被擊落，而且它的門也跟合頁脫開了。

sentences.english: All doors shall be supplied with three hinges.
sentences.chinese: 所有門都應該配置三個合頁。

sentences.english: Door hinge material is complete copper and stainless steel two kinds.
sentences.chinese: 房門合頁材料爲全銅和不鏽鋼兩種。

sentences.english: High – grade leaves are applied to bear a large area of window sash .
sentences.chinese: 採用高檔合頁，可承重大面積的窗扇。
